languages.text: "Главное же — мы собираем информацию и готовим побег. И день, когда мы устелем дорогу на свободу трупами мерзостных ксеносов, близок, соратники!" {n}Зажигательный выкрик Комиссара заставляет людей расправить плечи, гордо выпрямиться и ответить грозным боевым кличем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Главное же — мы собираем информацию и готовим побег. И день, когда мы устелем дорогу на свободу трупами мерзостных ксеносов, близок, соратники!" {n}Зажигательный выкрик Комиссара заставляет людей расправить плечи, гордо выпрямиться и ответить грозным боевым кличем.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Most importantly, we gather information and plot our escape. And the day when we pave the road to freedom with the corpses of detestable xenos is nigh!" {n}The Commissar's rallying shout makes his people square their shoulders, proudly straighten their backs, and respond with a fierce war cry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Most importantly, we gather information and plot our escape. And the day when we pave the road to freedom with the corpses of detestable xenos is nigh!" {n}The Commissar's rallying shout makes his people square their shoulders, proudly straighten their backs, and respond with a fierce war cry.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “最重要的是，我们负责收集信息，策划逃脱计划。用不了多久，我们就会用那些该死的异形的尸体，铺设出一条属于我们的自由之路！”{n}政委发出了热切的呼吁。他手下的士兵们挺起肩膀，骄傲地挺直了腰杆，以极为热烈的吼声回应着。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Most importantly, we gather information and plot our escape. And the day when we pave the road to freedom with the corpses of detestable xenos is nigh!" {n}The Commissar's rallying shout makes his people square their shoulders, proudly straighten their backs, and respond with a fierce war cry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “最重要的是，我们负责收集信息，策划逃脱计划。用不了多久，我们就会用那些该死的异形的尸体，铺设出一条属于我们的自由之路！”{n}政委发出了热切的呼吁。他手下的士兵们挺起肩膀，骄傲地挺直了腰杆，以极为热烈的吼声回应着。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「もっとも大事なのは、我々の脱出に役立つ情報を収集してから計画することです。憎むべき異種族の死体の上に、自由への道を切り開く日が迫ってきています！」{n}コミッサーの雄叫びは兵士たちを鼓舞し、彼らは肩を組んで誇らしげに背筋を伸ばし、激しい鬨の声で応答した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Most importantly, we gather information and plot our escape. And the day when we pave the road to freedom with the corpses of detestable xenos is nigh!" {n}The Commissar's rallying shout makes his people square their shoulders, proudly straighten their backs, and respond with a fierce war cry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もっとも大事なのは、我々の脱出に役立つ情報を収集してから計画することです。憎むべき異種族の死体の上に、自由への道を切り開く日が迫ってきています！」{n}コミッサーの雄叫びは兵士たちを鼓舞し、彼らは肩を組んで誇らしげに背筋を伸ばし、激しい鬨の声で応答した。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Y, lo que es más importante, reunimos información para planear nuestro escape. ¡Se acerca el día en el que recorreremos el camino a la libertad sobre los cadáveres de los detestables xenos!». {n}La arenga del Comisario hace que su gente se ponga firme, estire la espalda y responda con un fiero grito de guerra.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Most importantly, we gather information and plot our escape. And the day when we pave the road to freedom with the corpses of detestable xenos is nigh!" {n}The Commissar's rallying shout makes his people square their shoulders, proudly straighten their backs, and respond with a fierce war cry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y, lo que es más importante, reunimos información para planear nuestro escape. ¡Se acerca el día en el que recorreremos el camino a la libertad sobre los cadáveres de los detestables xenos!». {n}La arenga del Comisario hace que su gente se ponga firme, estire la espalda y responda con un fiero grito de guerra.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "Most importantly, we gather information and plot our escape. And the day when we pave the road to freedom with the corpses of detestable xenos is nigh!" {n}The Commissar's rallying shout makes his people square their shoulders, proudly straighten their backs, and respond with a fierce war cry.{/n}

languages.text: « À côté de ça, nous recueillons des informations et préparons notre évasion, et je peux vous dire que le grand jour est proche ! Bientôt, nous paverons le chemin menant à notre liberté des cadavres de ces maudits xénos ! » {n}Galvanisés par le cri de ralliement du commissaire, ses hommes redressent fièrement les épaules et répondent avec des cris de guerre tout aussi fervents.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Most importantly, we gather information and plot our escape. And the day when we pave the road to freedom with the corpses of detestable xenos is nigh!" {n}The Commissar's rallying shout makes his people square their shoulders, proudly straighten their backs, and respond with a fierce war cry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « À côté de ça, nous recueillons des informations et préparons notre évasion, et je peux vous dire que le grand jour est proche ! Bientôt, nous paverons le chemin menant à notre liberté des cadavres de ces maudits xénos ! » {n}Galvanisés par le cri de ralliement du commissaire, ses hommes redressent fièrement les épaules et répondent avec des cris de guerre tout aussi fervents.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Aber das Wichtigste ist, Informationen zu sammeln und unsere Flucht zu planen. Und der Tag, an dem wir die Straße zur Freiheit mit den Leichen widerwärtiger Xenos pflastern werden, ist nahe!" {n}Die Ansprache des Kommissars führt dazu, dass seine Leute sich breitschultrig hinstellen, stolz den Rücken aufrichten und mit einem wilden Kriegsruf antworten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Most importantly, we gather information and plot our escape. And the day when we pave the road to freedom with the corpses of detestable xenos is nigh!" {n}The Commissar's rallying shout makes his people square their shoulders, proudly straighten their backs, and respond with a fierce war cry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aber das Wichtigste ist, Informationen zu sammeln und unsere Flucht zu planen. Und der Tag, an dem wir die Straße zur Freiheit mit den Leichen widerwärtiger Xenos pflastern werden, ist nahe!" {n}Die Ansprache des Kommissars führt dazu, dass seine Leute sich breitschultrig hinstellen, stolz den Rücken aufrichten und mit einem wilden Kriegsruf antworten.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "En önemlisi de bilgi toplayıp kaçışımızı planlıyoruz. Özgürlüğe giden yolda, o iğrenç zenoların cesetleri üzerinde yürüyeceğimiz gün çok yakın!" {n}Komiser'in harekete geçiren çığlığı ile askerleri omuzlarını dikleştiriyor, dimdik durarak vahşi bir savaş narasıyla karşılık veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Most importantly, we gather information and plot our escape. And the day when we pave the road to freedom with the corpses of detestable xenos is nigh!" {n}The Commissar's rallying shout makes his people square their shoulders, proudly straighten their backs, and respond with a fierce war cry.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "En önemlisi de bilgi toplayıp kaçışımızı planlıyoruz. Özgürlüğe giden yolu, o iğrenç zenoların cesetleriyle açacağımız gün çok yakın!" {n}Komiser'in harekete geçiren çığlığı ile askerleri omuzlarını dikleştirdi, dimdik durarak vahşi bir savaş narasıyla cevap verdi.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
